devdoc.details: Contract module which provides a basic access control mechanism, where there is an account (an owner) that can be granted exclusive access to specific functions. * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier `onlyOwner`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to the owner.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.author: Nick Gheorghita <nickg@ethereum.org>

generatePackageId(string).details: Returns name hash for a given package name.

getAllPackageIds(uint256,uint256).details: Returns a slice of the array of all package ids for the named package.

params.offset: The starting index for the slice.

getAllReleaseIds(string,uint256,uint256).details: Returns a slice of the array of all release hashes for the named package.

params.offset: The starting index for the slice.

getPackageName(bytes32).details: Returns the string name of the package associated with a package id

params.packageId: The package id to look up

getReleaseData(bytes32).details: Returns the package data for a release.

getReleaseId(string,string).details: Returns the release id for a given name and version pair if present on registry.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

numPackageIds().details: Returns the number of packages stored on the registry

numReleaseIds(string).details: Returns the number of releases for a given package name on the registry

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

packageExists(string).details: Returns a bool indicating whether the given package exists in this registry.

release(string,string,string).details: Creates a new release for the named package.  If this is the first release for the given package then this will also create and store the package.  Returns releaseID if successful.

params.manifestURI: The URI for the release manifest for this release.

releaseExists(string,string).details: Returns a bool indicating whether the given release exists in this registry.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

validatePackageName(string).details: Returns boolean whether the provided package name is valid.

validateStringIdentifier(string).details: Returns boolean whether the input string has a length

devdoc.title: Contract for an ERC1319 Registry, adapted from ethpm/escape-truffle

devdoc.author: Piper Merriam <pipermerriam@gmail.com>, Christopher Gewecke <christophergewecke@gmail.com>

params.packageId: The package id to look up
